papers.name: Time-Driven Fire Risk Forecasting: Leveraging Historical Trends for Enhanced Seasonal Modeling
papers.summary: Co-authored a research paper highlighting our extensive methodologies that uniquely leverage the temporal dimension of historical Fire Weather Index (FWI) data to accurately classify world-wide geo-locations into appropritate risk levels. Notably, our models consistently achieve accuracies exceeding 90% across pertinent evaluation metrics for the North America Region, and have been validated against advanced weather-forecast-based ensembles.
